H0.text: Which European country’s national rail network is known as RENFE. Portugal

H1.text: Which European country’s national rail network is known as RENFE. Italy

H2.text: Which European country’s national rail network is known as RENFE. France

H3.text: Which European country’s national rail network is known as RENFE. SPAIN

A4.text: Renfe is Spain's national state-owned railway company.

A5.text: The name 'Renfe' is derived from the former Spanish National Railway Network created on 24 January 1941.
